trans-unit.source: Defines objects used to paint graphical objects.
trans-unit.target: 定义用于绘制图形对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> describe how the area is painted.
trans-unit.target: 派生自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> 的类描述如何绘制区域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> "paints" or "fills" an area with its output.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> "绘制"或用其输出"填充"区域。

trans-unit.source: Different brushes have different types of output.
trans-unit.target: 不同画笔具有不同类型的输出。

trans-unit.source: Some brushes paint an area with a solid color, others with a gradient, pattern, image, or drawing.
trans-unit.target: 某些画笔绘制带有纯色，具有渐变、 模式、 图像或绘图的其他人的区域。

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the different types of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] brushes:
trans-unit.target: 以下列表描述了不同类型的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]画笔：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>: Paints an area with a solid <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>： 使用绘制区域可靠<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>: Paints an area with a linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>： 绘制带有线性渐变的区域。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>: Paints an area with a radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>： 绘制带有径向渐变的区域。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>: Paints an area with an image (represented by an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource> object).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>： 绘制与图像区域 (由表示<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>对象)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>: Paints an area with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>： 使用绘制区域<xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>。

trans-unit.source: The drawing may include vector and bitmap objects.
trans-unit.target: 绘制可能包括矢量和位图的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>: Paints an area with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>： 使用绘制区域<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush> enables you to duplicate content from one portion of your application into another area; it's very useful for creating reflection effects and magnifying portions of the screen.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>使您能够从你的应用程序到另一个区域; 的一部分中的内容执行重复它将用于创建反射效果和放大屏幕的部分非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Predefined Brushes
trans-unit.target: 预定义的画笔

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes> class to paint an object using a predefined solid color, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.AliceBlue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Red%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>类来绘制对象使用预定义的纯色，如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.AliceBlue%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Red%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Brushes in XAML
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中的画笔

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> types that can be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and the syntax they support.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>可以在中使用的类型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]以及它们支持的语法。

trans-unit.source: For detailed syntax information for a specific brush, see that brush's type page.
trans-unit.target: 特定的画笔的详细的语法信息，请参阅该画笔类型页。

trans-unit.source: For an example showing how to quickly paint an area with a solid color, see [How to: Paint an Area with a Solid Color](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-paint-an-area-with-a-solid-color.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何快速绘制用一种颜色区域的示例，请参阅[如何： 使用纯色绘制区域](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-paint-an-area-with-a-solid-color.md)。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: A brush is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: 画笔是一种<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see the **Remarks** section.
trans-unit.target: 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅**备注**部分。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> class, you must override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />类，必须重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Depending on whether your class must perform additional initialization work or contains non-dependency property data members, you might need to override additional <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于你的类必须执行其他初始化工作还是包含非依赖项属性数据成员，你可能需要重写其他<see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about inheriting from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> types, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关从继承<see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />类型，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the degree of opacity of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> 的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity" /> property is expressed as a value between 0.0 and 1.0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity" /> 属性的值以 0.0 和 1.0 之间的值表示。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1.0。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A> value of 0 indicates that the brush is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the brush is completely opaque.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A>值 0 指示画笔是完全透明，而值为 1，则表示画笔完全不透明。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.5 indicates the brush is 50% opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates the brush is 72.5% opaque, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 0.5 指示画笔为 50%不透明，值为 0.725 指示画笔为 72.5%不透明，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.
trans-unit.target: 小于 0 的值将被视为 0，而大于 1 的值将被视为 1。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the transformation that is applied to the brush using relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置使用相对坐标应用到画笔的转换。

trans-unit.source: The transformation that is applied to the brush using relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 使用相对坐标应用到画笔的转换。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Transform.Identity" /> transformation.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Transform.Identity" /> 变换。

trans-unit.source: This property is especially useful when you want to rotate, scale, skew, or otherwise transform a brush about its center, but you don't know the size of the area painted with the brush, or you are using the same brush to paint different areas with different sizes.
trans-unit.target: 你想要旋转、 缩放、 倾斜或否则转换画笔围绕其中心，但你不知道使用画笔，绘制区域的大小或使用相同的画笔绘制具有不同大小的不同区域时，此属性是特别有用。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about this property, see the [Brush Transformation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/brush-transformation-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关此属性的详细信息，请参阅[画笔转换概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/brush-transformation-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brush.RelativeTransform" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brush.RelativeTransform" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: null 引用（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）将使用为 <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> 实现的类型所定义的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用于对值设置格式的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: null 引用（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）将从操作系统的当前区域设置中获取数字格式信息。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定格式对当前实例的值设置格式。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 采用指定格式的当前实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 创建此对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Return string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> 的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 此对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Culture-specific formatting information, or <see langword="null" /> to use the default formatting of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 区域性特定的格式设置信息；如果使用当前区域性的默认格式设置，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object based on the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 基于指定的区域性特定格式设置信息创建此对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 此对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the transformation that is applied to the brush.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于画笔的转换。

trans-unit.source: This transformation is applied after the brush's output has been mapped and positioned.
trans-unit.target: 此转换在完成画笔输出的映射和定位后应用。

trans-unit.source: The transformation to apply to the brush.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于画笔的转换。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Transform.Identity" /> transformation.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Transform.Identity" /> 变换。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to rotate, scale, skew, or translate a brush's content.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于旋转、 缩放、 倾斜或转换画笔的内容。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about this property, see the [Brush Transformation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/brush-transformation-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关此属性的详细信息，请参阅[画笔转换概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/brush-transformation-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Transform" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Transform" /> 依赖项属性。
